CustomField.formula: IF(OR(Cost_of_Delivery_and_Return__c>0, Cost_of_Installation_and_Dismantle__c >0,Total_Building_Cost__c >0), Cost_of_Delivery_and_Return__c+Cost_of_Installation_and_Dismantle__c+Total_Building_Cost__c , IF(ISPICKVAL( Transaction_Type__c,'Rental'), Total_Building_Cost__c + Upfront_Project_Costs_L__c + Backend_Teardown_Costs_L__c , Total_Building_Cost__c + Upfront_Project_Costs_S__c + Total_Change_Order_Cost__c ) )
CustomField.label: Total Project Costs
